publicationStmt.date: the .ix. daye of Marche. the yere of our lorde M.LLLL.lxxxxvi] [1496, i.e. 1499?]

notesStmt.note: An English translation, by "a deuoute student of the Vnyuersyte of Cambrydge", of: Bernard of Clairvaux. Tractatus de interiori domo.
GW attributes this work to Pseudo-Bernard.
Imprint from colophon; actual date of publication suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
